rows.label: tlk000501_08_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello. Me still carefully picking through
each of Bahn's letters for evidence.

rows.label: tlk000501_08_msg0002
rows.name:
But each written with so much love,
hard not to get tears in eyes...

rows.label: tlk000501_08_msg0003
rows.name:
Nilny ashamed. Had suspected
Bahn of things like bribery and pollen
dealing...

rows.label: tlk000501_08_msg0004
rows.name:
But suspicions were all wrong.
Bahn clean as polished whistle!
